definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)

sentences.english: Scenery near the West Lake is actually a love picture.
sentences.chinese: 西湖邊的風景，確是一幅愛情的畫卷。

sentences.english: Here is the even shop summit in on a mountain beautiful picture scroll.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是平鋪在高山之巔上的一幅美麗的畫卷。

sentences.english: Spring is definitely a busy life picture.
sentences.chinese: 春，絕對是一幅飽蘸着生命繁華的畫卷。

sentences.english: They display the development of mankind with both positive and negative sides.
sentences.chinese: 它們從正面和負面描寫着仁攀類發展的畫卷。

sentences.english: Dangers like speedy motorized vehicles are newcomers on the landscape of life.
sentences.chinese: 快速行駛的機動車之類的危險是生活畫卷中的新生物。

sentences.english: Cloud floating in the sky, the beauty of the figures are the gratefulness to the sky.
sentences.chinese: 白雲在天空飄蕩，那美麗的畫卷是對藍天的感恩。

sentences.english: Zhangjiajie into, as into the picture of a pair of quiet.
sentences.chinese: 走進張家界，就如同走進了一副安靜的畫卷。

sentences.english: They look like a hundred-kilometer-long scroll of a landscape.
sentences.chinese: 它們看起來像百里畫卷。

sentences.english: The Olympic flame went out slowly as the athlete folded the painting again.
sentences.chinese: 隨着運動員將畫卷再次折起，奧運聖火緩緩熄滅。

sentences.english: Gu Hongzhong's Han Xizai Evening Banquet is one of the masterpieces of Southern Tang Dynasty painting.
sentences.chinese: 畫卷中的主人公是南唐中書侍郎韓熙載。

sentences.english: The construction of Lu Pu Bridge was completed in 2003, adding a brilliant touch to the picture of the modern Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 年建設完工，爲上海現代城市畫卷填上了壯麗的一筆。

sentences.english: The painting is placed on scrolls that can be rolled up so it can be carried quite easily.
sentences.chinese: 這畫裝上了卷軸，可以將畫卷起來，所以攜帶很方便。

sentences.english: Wannan, a beautiful landscape scroll painting of the Southern Anhui unrolling in front of us!
sentences.chinese: 皖南，就是一幅舒展不盡的秀麗畫卷。

definition: lucid and elegant/quiet and exquisite/clear and attractive style
simple and unadorned (of art, architecture etc)
in different poses and with different expressions/in thousands of postures (idiom)
